title: Clytie - cooking of three separate meals reveals

content.question: What does the cooking of three separate meals primarily reveal about Clytie?

choices.label: The high priority she gives to her own needs
Her position as the head of the family
Her acquiescence to a seemingly unreasonable requirement

content.answer: Her acquiescence to a seemingly unreasonable requirement

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
